title: The House
description: When Kelly Horn finds out her father, former FBI agent Scott Horn, has been murdered at his house, she is stunned. As police dig into Scott’s past, they begin to think the key to the mystery might be quite close to home. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 17, 2020.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
